scripts.dev: node scripts/genabi.mjs && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_RELAYER_MODE=production next dev
scripts.dev:mock: node scripts/is-hardhat-node-running.mjs && node scripts/genabi.mjs && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_RELAYER_MODE=mock next dev
scripts.build: npm run check:static && node scripts/genabi.mjs && cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_RELAYER_MODE=production next build
